#Text=Israeli air strikes hit government compounds in Gaza
#Text=Saturday , December 27 , 2008
#Text=Map of the Palestinian-Israeli conflict area and War on Terrorism around the Gaza strip
#Text=Israel has launched with at least 30 simultaneous missiles strikes on Hamas installations in Gaza City , causing heavy damage .
#Text=F-16 fighters targeted security compounds in the city ’s centre .
#Text=The “ massive ” air strikes on Saturday have claimed at least 220 lives , including Gaza police chief Maj. Gen. Tawfiq Jaber .
#Text=More than 700 were injured , while others were still buried under the rubble , according to Health Ministry officer Moawiya Hassanain .
#Text=Gaza City hospitals , including Shifa Hospital , Gaza ’s main treatment center , are crowded with wounded victims .
#Text=In response thirteen rockets and mortar shells had also hit southern Israel on Friday , damaging an unoccupied house .
#Text=Meanwhile , Hamas declared it would retaliate , by launching rocket attacks on and sending suicide bombers to Israel .
#Text=“ Hamas will continue the resistance until the last drop of blood , ” warned Hamas spokesman Fawzi Barhoum .
#Text=Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas , Hamas ’ rival , says he “ condemns this aggression ” and calls for restraint .
#Text=Map of the Hamas -run Gaza Strip .
#Text=Qassam rocket fired from the Gaza Strip hits southern Ashkelon in Israel .
#Text=When the Egyptian-mediated truce terminated last week , Israel warned of their potential to launch a major offensive on Gaza , amid senior leaders ’ call to topple Hamas .

#Text=“ I will not hesitate to use Israel ’s strength to strike at Hamas and Islamic Jihad , ” Prime Minister Ehud Olmert announced on Thursday , issuing a dire warning that ” tens of thousands of children and innocents ” would be at risk “ as a result of Hamas ’ actions . ”
#Text=Defense Minister Ehud Barak says Israel has temporarily opened some border crossings Friday to allow humanitarian aid into the Gaza Strip in response to the international community ’s pleas .
#Text=Two hours after IAF missiles targeted Hamas installations in the Gaza Strip , Palestinian gunmen launched on Saturday a massive attack with Qassam rockets on Israeli territory .
#Text=Seven struck Ashkelon , killing one person , while another suffered serious injuries , and four others were moderately wounded when their house was hit .
#Text=They were rushed to the Soroka hospital in Beersheva .
#Text=According to the IDF , Hamas militants had further launched more than 110 rockets since Saturday , IDF says .
#Text=Meanwhile , a Palestinian Ambassador Riyad Mansour has called on the United Nations to condemn the deadly violence .
#Text="

#Text=The 2008 – 2009 Israel – Gaza conflict , referred to as  Operation Cast Lead " ( מבצע עופרת יצוקה - also known as " Operation Solid Lead " ) by the Israel Defense Forces ( IDF ) , is an Israeli air strike operation launched on December 27 , 2008 at 11:30 am local time ( 9:30 am UTC ) against Hamas targets in the Gaza Strip .

column1: #Text=Israeli officials justified the offensive as a retaliation against daily Palestinian Qassam rocket and mortar fire on Israel 's southern communities .
